name: 3 Rules of 2-Color Shapeshifting in a Microworld on a Flikering Torus
name_original: 3 Rules of 2-Color Shapeshifting in a Microworld on a Flikering Torus
description:
48h Ludum Dare 35 compo; theme: shapeshifting.

A variant of sokoban, with shapeshifting, and pipes, and guns, on a torus which flickers.

Just check the help (f1 or h).

Controls: arrows or WSAD, r for restart.

Warning: it really flickers.
